data.title: Max Brannon & Sons Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Tommy Davidson, 71, of Calhoun, Georgia, passed away Wednesday, September 27, 2023.  He was born in Dayton, Ohio on April 13, 1952, to the late Frank and Mary Johnson.Tommy is s...
data.text:
Tommy Davidson, 71, of Calhoun, Georgia, passed away Wednesday, September 27, 2023. He was born in Dayton, Ohio on April 13, 1952, to the late Frank and Mary Johnson.

Tommy is survived by his loving wife, Patsy Davidson; sons, Terry Fouts (Kimberly), David Fouts (Misty), Zac Davidson (Ginger), Eric Davidson (Lindsey); daughter, Cindy Burchett (Clyde); sister, Patty Logan; grandchildren, Chris, Raylee, Hannah, Austin, Lexie, Jared, Jada, Jackson, Jacob and Lyla Rae; great-grandchildren, Miles, Colton, and Max.

The family will receive friends on Thursday, September 28, 2023, from 5:00 PM until 8:00 PM from Sugar Valley Baptist Church.

A funeral service will be held on Friday, September 29, 2023, at 1:00 PM from Sugar Valley Baptist Church with Rev. Mitch Phillips and Rev. Eddie Brannon officiating. Entombment will follow in Chandler Cemetery. Pallbearers Chris Fouts, Jacob Fouts, Jared Jaco, Jackson Burchett, Mike Vowell, and Terry Caldwell.

The Brannon family and staff are honored to serve the family of Tommy Davidson.
